item.description: 404 We can’t seem to find this page’s pixels. Sorry about that, chief.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Joonas, and I’m a software engineer from Finland. I run function61.com. For my open source work, see the GitHub link on the top of this page. My interests are: Improving software architecture, EventSourcing / CQRS Homelabbing, home automation and data hoarding Distributed systems, infrastructure software Learning better programming languages (Golang, Rust) Raspberry Pi, Arduino etc. various electronics projects I am inspired by these people: Jessie Frazelle (wrote her own “even GUI apps are containers” -based OS) Michael Stapelberg (“My router doesn’t work?

item.title: Thanks for contacting me!
item.description: I will get in touch with you, if your message prompted for response.
